name: When the War was Home - Demo
name_original: When the War was Home - Demo
description:
Note: This is a demo released for NaNoRenO 2020

A city of snow, hearts forged in steel. Doctor Imani Ward carries the scars of a war long ended, and our own burdens as we move forward.  With the Doctor's help mending the wounds of others, both in body and mind, our pasts begin to bind us together, memories echoing into the future ahead.

Assist your patients, as you've done throughout your career — the days carrying on, one after the next.  Provide aid to those in need, forging your bonds with those still here.  Your job is not yet over, your mission still unaccomplished.

Submission for NaNoRenO 2020

Watercress is an international game developer and publisher consisting of approximately 50 members, with nearly 25 members participating on this project.  When the War was Home is our sixth NaNoRenO release, and our 10th published game.

When the War was Home features, some included in the full release:

  • Demo with 3.5k words
  • Interactive
  • 100% in-house soundtrack and art
  • Innovative calendar system to progress
